title-group.article-title: The Matter of Culture: Aesthetic Experience and Corporeal Being

abstract.p: This essay considers the critical role of art in the actualization of embodied subjectivity. Drawing on the work of Paul Ricoeur, Félix Guattari, and Mikhail Bakhtin, the author argues that an active engagement with art is intrinsic to both the generation of meaning and the process of subjective becoming.
